resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40c87b29-c5f8-4415-20b0-056bcd7d2582#1#8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az iszlám kialakulása, korai története</string>
            <string language="en">development of islam, early history</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung des Islams, Frühgeschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">développement de l'Islam, histoire des débuts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desenvolvimento do islam, history adiantado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sviluppo di Islam, storia remota</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάπτυξη του Ισλάμ, πρόωρη ιστορία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">desarrollo del Islam, historia temprana</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Mohamed próféta hite, az iszlám eredete, a Korán és az arab írás</string>
            <string language="en">faith of prophet Mohamed, the origin of islamic religion, the Koran and the arabic writing</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">iszlám,  Mohamed,  arab írás,  </string>
            <string language="en">islam, Mohamed, arab writing</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glaube des Prophets Mohamed, der Ursprung der 
islamischen Religion, des Koran und des arabischen Schreibens</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">foi de prophète Mohamed, l'origine de la 
religion islamique, de Coran et de l'écriture arabe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fé do prophet Mohamed, a origem da religião 
islamic, do Koran e da escrita árabe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fede del prophet Mohamed, l'origine della 
religione islamica, del Koran e della scrittura araba</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πίστη του προφήτη Mohamed, η προέλευση της 
ισλαμικής θρησκείας, του Koran και του αραβικού γραψίματος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fe del profeta Mohamed, el origen de la religión 
islámica, del Koran y de la escritura árabe</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Islam, Mohamed, arabisches Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Islam, Mohamed, écriture arabe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">islam, Mohamed, escrita árabe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Islam, Mohamed, scrittura araba</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισλάμ, Mohamed, αραβικό γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Islam, Mohamed, escritura árabe</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        <rights>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0

end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>

        <metaMetadata>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
